revised_title: Observations of Jupiter's Satellites Eclipses from 1726 to 1728
tldr: Monsieur De Lisle, Astronomer Royal at Petersburgh, shares his observations of the eclipses of Jupiter's satellites from July 10th, 1726, to April 12th, 1728. He compares his findings with observations made in England, aiming to settle the difference in their meridians.
